title: Ultramarine Linux: Fedora Made Easy and Beautiful for Everyone
author: Jack Wallen
description: Ultramarine Linux is a Fedora-based distribution designed to be user-friendly for Linux newcomers while still offering advanced features for experienced users.
cntitle: 深蓝Linux：人人皆宜的简洁美观的Fedora发行版
cndescription: Ultramarine Linux 是一个基于 Fedora 的发行版，旨在为 Linux 新手提供用户友好的体验，同时仍为经验丰富的用户提供高级功能。
